findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateStartblock() could fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big or the poolInfo list is long.

findings.title: add() function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool() will be incorrect.

findings.title: Reentrancy protection
findings.description: Key functions of the MasterBuilder contract are not protected from re-entry.

findings.title: updatePool() function doesn’t mint reward tokens
findings.description: The updatePool() function does not mint reward tokens as expected.
